Please include all of your certifications in your UPSA profile.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"*If you have already passed or are planning to take Microsoft Certification exams, you can associate your Microsoft Certification Accounts with EPAM on Microsoft Partner Center. It will also help you with your skills recognition.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/UPSA/Past+project+experience\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Adding information on past projects\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": Information on past projects reflects both your previous project work at EPAM and elsewhere and completed tasks. This lets EPAM see the full history of your past work, including expertise and technologies, and lets resource managers across the company find your profile according to set criteria. This is useful not only for project staffing but also, for example, finding expertise on specific
